description.value: A mech bay takes up two expansion bays and can be installed only in a Large or larger ship. It can store 4 Huge mechs, 2 Gargantuan mechs, or 1 Colossal mech. While a mech is housed in a mech bay, repairs on it take half the time and shield regeneration is twice as fast. Mechs can be deployed from the bay directly to a planetâ€™s surface if the ship is landed, or they can be loaded into an available @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.vehicles.Actor.x0klv9uWW4crarM5]{drop pod} (Starship Operations Manual 25) or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.starship-components.Item.ZCdtfwxHAsEthpzy]{sky crane} (page 29).
